entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is described as flipping a paper over and holding it up to show a picture of Ron's parents. He also makes derogatory comments about Ron's mother.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as shaking with fury and being stared at by everyone. Harry and Hermione grab the back of his robes to stop him from attacking Malfoy.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as defending Ron and making a comment about Malfoy's mother.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as grabbing the back of Ron's robes to stop him from attacking Malfoy.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is mentioned as a surname for Harry.

relationships.description: Harry defends Ron against Malfoy's insult.
Hermione helps to prevent Ron from attacking Malfoy.
Harry insults Malfoy's mother in return.
